title: Slay Slay: Watch That Girl LayLay Freestyle On Atlanta Radio
content: Source: ROBYN BECK / Getty That Girl LayLay is making moves. The 11-year-old Houston native visited Atlanta radio to spit another jaw-dropping freestyle. 11 year old lyricist that would BODY any of your favorite rappers!! #laylay #11yroldrapper watch the full freestyle here -> https://t.co/qvVWlRJdGT pic.twitter.com/h6eObBnAkX — The People's Station (@V103Atlanta) June 1, 2018 Watch her breakout freestyle below and follow @That_Girl_LayLay44 on Instagram.
